entities.name: beech tree
entities.description: The beech tree is described as providing shade for the group to sit under. ("They spread their books out in the shade of the beech tree and sat down")

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is described as talking through his first save of the match. ("Ron talked them through his first save of the match for what felt like the dozenth time.")

entities.name: Davies
entities.description: Davies is mentioned as having let in a goal. ("I mean, I’d already let in that one of Davies’s")

entities.name: Bradley
entities.description: Bradley is described as coming towards Ron. ("wh en Bradley came toward me")

relationships.description: Ron and his group sat under the beech tree. ("They spread their books out in the shade of the beech tree and sat down")
Davies let in a goal. ("I mean, I’d already let in that one of Davies’s")
Bradley came towards Ron. ("wh en Bradley came toward me")
